name: Ghost Town (itch) (TheCodeMaster)
description:
You have died, which is where most stories usually end, but you have work to do. Discover why your soul refuses to cross the barrier, Show the people of Ghost Town that just because they feel lonely, it doesn't make them alone, and maybe in the process, cure a town of it's chronic loneliness. 

Ghost Town is an open-world RPG made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, with the theme of "You're not alone." I had an absolute blast making this game, and i hope that people enjoy it!

Credits:

Game Design, Artwork, Music, Dialog, Programming, Story : TheCodeMaster
